name: Support Group
description:
Support Group

A visual novel game created in 48 hr (5 hours lost to sleep) about students responding to the COVID-19 outbreak.

Heavily inspired by my friends <3

~

Support Group is a Visual Novel. Rotate through 3 students from the same school but  all having a different perspective towards the current COVID-19 outbreak. 

5-10 minutes of compact gameplay.

~

CREDITS:

Sounds from LAKEY INSPIRED and Brand Name Audio (YouTube).
Special thanks to Aeris, Phos, my friends at school (including Liam)  & everyone part of NIO studios for the inspiration and motivation boosts <3
